ygData.subject: RE: Smithing and mold question
ygData.msgSnippet: One of the Ogre huts in the Feerrott has large molds. It s near the Oggok zone entrance. ... From:	Dave Gaines [mailto:dave@iglou.com] Sent:	Wednesday, August
ygData.messageBody:
One of the Ogre huts in the Feerrott has large molds. It's near the
Oggok zone entrance.

-----Original Message-----
From: Dave Gaines [mailto:dave@...]

Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Smithing and mold
question

available in both
towns, but could be wrong.
